ori_summary: boxfish - palo alto, ca - full time - data scientist (you can call yourself whatever you want, as long as you're up to snuff with ml) - h1b ok (visa sort) boxfish captures and indexes every word spoken on tv. our mission is to harness this vast resource and deliver on our platform, beautiful and inspiring consumer focused products that reimagine tv discovery. we launched our product, 'boxfish live guide' on iphone, ipad, and android (mobile + tablet), which a tv discovery app and remote control and are continuing our move onto google tv and connected devices. we're a team of 9 and growing, with a position open for an exceptional data scientist. long story short, we're looking for developers to build the index of tv, semantic processing pipelines in realtime, distributed services for trending, + metrics and search applications (stack: aws deployed redis, mongodb & elasticsearch). if you're interested, get in touch - redacted_email'
